mkdir -p seed && cd seed

cat > meta-data <<EOF 
instance-id: iid-local01
local-hostname: centos-from-lightstar
EOF

cat > user-data <<EOF 
#cloud-config
password: root@123
chpasswd: { expire: False }
ssh_pwauth: True
  - ssh-rsa  daniel-pc@easystack.cn
users:
  - name: daniel
    gecos: Daniel ding
    sudo: ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
    groups: users, admin
    lock_passwd: true
    ssh_authorized_keys:
      - ssh-rsa  daniel-pc@easystack.cn
EOF

## change centos's password root.

genisoimage -input-charset utf-8 -output ../seed.iso -volid cidata -joliet -rock user-data meta-data
